src:
Real Madrid vs Real Betis, Hindarkan Bernabeu dari Aib
02 Nov 2019, 18:27 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Real Madrid selalu kalah dalam dua laga kandang terakhirnya melawan Real Betis di La Liga. Bagi Madrid, aib di Santiago Bernabeu itu sama sekali tak boleh terulang.
Real Madrid akan menjamu Real Betis di Santiago Bernabeu pada pekan ke-12 La Liga 2019/20, Minggu (03/11/2019).
Madrid selalu kalah dalam dua laga kandang terakhirnya melawan Betis di La Liga. Mereka kalah 0-1 pada musim 2017/18 dan 0-2 musim 2018/19.
Pada musim 2017/18, Madrid takluk di Bernabeu oleh gol tunggal Antonio Sanabria menit 94. Musim lalu, Madrid dipaksa menyerah 0-2 oleh gol-gol Loren Moron menit 61 dan Jese menit 75.
Jika Betis menang lagi di Bernabeu, maka mereka akan mencatatkan sebuah prestasi fantastis. Sebaliknya, bagi Madrid, itu akan jadi sebuah aib.
Scroll terus ke bawah.
text:
Real Madrid vs Real Betis, Avoid the Bernabeu from Disgrace
02 Nov 2019, 18:27 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Real Madrid have always lost their last two home games against Real Betis in La Liga. For Madrid, the disgrace at the Santiago Bernabeu must not be repeated at all.
Real Madrid will host Real Betis at the Santiago Bernabeu in Week 12 of La Liga 2019/20, Sunday (11/03/2019).
Madrid always lost their last two home matches against Betis in La Liga. They lost 0-1 in the 2017/18 season and 0-2 in the 2018/19 season.
In the 2017/18 season, Madrid were defeated at the Bernabeu by Antonio Sanabria's sole goal in the 94th minute. Last season, Madrid were forced to give up 0-2 by Loren Moron's goals in the 61st minute and Jese in the 75th minute.
If Betis win again at the Bernabeu, they will record a fantastic achievement. Conversely, for Madrid, it will be a disgrace.
Scroll down.
